sections.title: 1986 ACL MEMBERSHIP LIST
paragraphs: Following is a listing of the 1986 members of the

sections.title: Association for Computational Linguistics
paragraphs: as of the end of the year. The 1949 personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. The 419 institutional members follow, beginning with those from the United States, ordered by ZIP-code, and then the rest ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear below. Information should be forwarded to the ACL Secretary-Treasurer. Anannya Rhattacharjee Luanne Burns Clinton Fein Heidi Johnson Brett Kessler Randall Sharp Jeffrey M. Siskind
